name: Un-Bee Leap-able: Bee Flat
description:
You play as a ninja trying to make it past all the giant bees.  Deploy your glider to fly to safety.  You can upgrade your glider and launch speed to go further.

Source Code: https://github.com/Bluzix/bee-flat

Special Thanks to Jedulz (https://github.com/jedulz)!  I couldn't have completed the game on time without you.
